text: "Do as I say, driver. Very stern, the reverend gentleman was. So the driver peep-peeped as though he were edging his way through a herd of cows, instead of hurtling through empty space." Thank you, the Rev. Edwards said courteously. "Secondly, we must pool and ration our supplies of food, if any. He looked at Price the Provisions, who was nursing a great basket."
handwritten_text: "Do as I say, driver. Very stern, the reverend gentleman was. So the driver peep-peeped as though he were edging his way through a herd of cows, instead of hurtling through empty space." Thank you, the Rev. Edwards said courteously. "Secondly, we must pool and ration our supplies of food, if any. He looked at Price the Provisions, who was nursing a great basket."
